about_the_game:
Help your clients find love in Hearts Will Be Broken! Play the classic game of Hearts in a matchmaking roguelite where each card you play can change the story, and your mission is love.  Banter with a cast of misfits looking for love, each with their own personalities, goals, and secrets.

Unlock new abilities as you progress, boosting your matchmaking skills and unlocking hidden characters and other secrets.  Who knows, you may even find love yourself.

You can even take your Hearts skills to the table against other players in the multiplayer mode. Play the classic version or being all the charm and chaos of your special cards and abilities to the table.
